00022 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE( scene_graph_stream_operator_test )
00023 {
00024         GroupNode groupNode( "My Node" );
00025         std::ostringstream os;
00026         os << groupNode;
00027         BOOST_REQUIRE( "Node{My Node,0,GroupNode}" 
00028                 == os.str() );
00029         
00030 }

00032 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE( scene_graph_add_root_node_test )
00033 {
00034         boost::shared_ptr< SceneGraphNode > pSceneGraphNode( new GroupNode( "My Node" ) ), 
00035                 pRetrievedNode;
00036         SceneGraph sceneGraph;
00037         sceneGraph.addRootNode( pSceneGraphNode );
00038         pRetrievedNode = sceneGraph.getNode(0);
00039         BOOST_REQUIRE( pSceneGraphNode->getId() == pRetrievedNode->getId() );
00040 }
00041 
00042 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE( scene_graph_add_node_test )
00043 {
00044         boost::shared_ptr< SceneGraphNode > pParentNode( new GroupNode( "Parent Node" ) ), 
00045                 pChildNode( new GroupNode( "Child Node" ) );
00046         SceneGraph sceneGraph;
00047         sceneGraph.addRootNode( pParentNode );
00048         sceneGraph.addNode(pParentNode, pChildNode);
00049         BOOST_REQUIRE( pParentNode->getId() != pChildNode->getId() ); 
00050 }

00054 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE( print_vertices_test )
00055 {
00056         using namespace boost;
00057         typedef shared_ptr< SceneGraphNode > node_pointer_type;
00058         node_pointer_type family_node( new GroupNode("Family") );
00059         node_pointer_type troy_node( new GroupNode("Troy") );
00060         node_pointer_type vivian_node( new GroupNode("Vivian") );
00061         node_pointer_type gail_node( new GroupNode("Gail") );
00062         node_pointer_type chris_node( new GroupNode("Chris") );
00063         node_pointer_type travis_node( new GroupNode("Travis") );
00064         node_pointer_type diane_node( new GroupNode("Diane") );
00065         node_pointer_type joyce_node( new GroupNode("Joyce") );
00066         node_pointer_type mah_node( new GroupNode("Mah") );
00067         node_pointer_type wang_node( new GroupNode("Wang") );
00068         SceneGraph sceneGraph;
00069         sceneGraph.addRootNode( family_node );
00070         sceneGraph.addNode( family_node, troy_node );
00071         sceneGraph.addNode( family_node, vivian_node );
00072         sceneGraph.addNode( family_node, gail_node );
00073         sceneGraph.addNode( family_node, chris_node );
00074         sceneGraph.addNode( family_node, travis_node );
00075         sceneGraph.addNode( family_node, diane_node );
00076         sceneGraph.addNode( family_node, mah_node );
00077         sceneGraph.addNode( family_node, joyce_node );
00078         sceneGraph.addNode( family_node, wang_node );
00079         std::string testString = "Node{Family,0,GroupNode}\n";
00080         testString += "Node{Troy,1,GroupNode}\n";
00081         testString += "Node{Vivian,2,GroupNode}\n";
00082         testString += "Node{Gail,3,GroupNode}\n";
00083         testString += "Node{Chris,4,GroupNode}\n";
00084         testString += "Node{Travis,5,GroupNode}\n";
00085         testString += "Node{Diane,6,GroupNode}\n";
00086         testString += "Node{Mah,7,GroupNode}\n";
00087         testString += "Node{Joyce,8,GroupNode}\n";
00088         testString += "Node{Wang,9,GroupNode}\n";
00089         std::string aString = sceneGraph.listNodes( );
00090         BOOST_REQUIRE( testString == aString );
00091 }

00093 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE( pretty_print_vertices_test )
00094 {
00095         using namespace boost;
00096         shared_ptr<SceneGraph> pGraph( new SceneGraph() );
00097         typedef shared_ptr< SceneGraphNode > node_pointer_type;
00098         typedef graph_traits< graph_type >::vertices_size_type size_type;
00099         node_pointer_type family_node( new GroupNode("Family") );
00100         node_pointer_type gail_node( new GroupNode("Gail") );
00101         node_pointer_type troy_node( new GroupNode("Troy") );
00102         node_pointer_type chris_node( new GroupNode("Chris") );
00103         node_pointer_type travis_node( new GroupNode("Travis") );
00104         node_pointer_type joyce_node( new GroupNode("Joyce") );
00105 
00106         pGraph->addRootNode( family_node );
00107         pGraph->addNode( family_node, gail_node );
00108         pGraph->addNode( gail_node, troy_node );
00109         pGraph->addNode( gail_node, chris_node );
00110         pGraph->addNode( gail_node, travis_node );
00111         pGraph->addNode( troy_node, joyce_node );
00112 
00113         ListGraphVisitor lgv( pGraph );
00114 
00115         depth_first_search( pGraph->getGraph(), visitor(lgv) );
00116 
00117         std::string test_string = "\nNode{Family,0,GroupNode}";
00118     test_string += "\n\tNode{Gail,1,GroupNode}";
00119         test_string += "\n\t\tNode{Troy,2,GroupNode}";
00120         test_string += "\n\t\t\tNode{Joyce,5,GroupNode}";
00121     test_string += "\n\t\tNode{Chris,3,GroupNode}";
00122     test_string += "\n\t\tNode{Travis,4,GroupNode}";
00123         
00124 
00125         BOOST_REQUIRE(  test_string == lgv.getGraphList() );
00126 }
